thread.section_title: Hotel Magenta 38 by HappyCulture - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Comfortable and friendly hotel
thread.title_full: Comfortable and friendly hotel - Review of Hotel Magenta 38 by HappyCulture, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Joanne G
title: Comfortable and friendly hotel
text:
This is a simple hotel but with everything you need. The staff were really friendly and helpful which is just what you need and the simple d√©cor was fresh and funky.
I would definitely choose this or another hotel from the Happy Culture chain if I visited Paris again.
